alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:31PM CDT until June 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON AND SOUTHWESTERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chunky, or 14 miles southwest of Meridian, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Meehan around 740 PM CDT. Nellieburg around 750 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
